data.title: I am a pet owner. Is this safe for my pet?
data.content: Our portal only has verified pet sitters, and we make sure to support you thorughout as to guarantee a safe and fun experience for your pet.

data.title: I am a pet sitter. How do I choose a stay?
data.content: Navigate to our database section and read the pet profiles for upcoming sits. Choose a sit that suits you best and we will confirm once your request has been approved.

data.title: I am a pet. What's in it for me?
data.content: Expect lots of love, playtime and treats from your pet sitter!

data.title: I am a developer. Where is the source code for this website?
